attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Blimey the bloke's apologised hasn't he.  Of the 400,000 people who listended to Russell Brand's show only two complained.  One of them was Andrew Sachs.  Let's exclude him.  That is a complaint rate of 0.00025%. This suggests to me that Brand and Ross were perfectly in tune with the demographic of their listeners. In reality he only offended those two listeners.  The rest have been geed up by the idiocies of the tabloids.  So, yes he was wrong.  He agrees.  He has apologised.  That's enough, let him get back to work.[Jonathan, if they do reinstate you 10% of your earnings for the relevant period would be a handsome gesture]

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
